short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join the community and see and use kpop emojis across different websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KPow is a fun and exciting Google Chrome extension designed to add some K-pop magic to your online interactions. With KPow, you can easily add K-pop-themed emojis to webpages and more, expressing your love for your favorite K-pop groups in a fun and creative way. 

How does it work?
Just download the extension and refer to our emoji list! When you type a specific emoji like ":BTSCheese" (keep the colon and ignore the quotation marks), and refresh the page, KPOW will automatically replace it with the right emoji.

What Emojis are available?
Right now we are still alpha testing and building out features, so the current list is on the screenshot. Have specific emoji you want? Feel free to join our Patreon and request for specific ones!
